matches.title: Coconut Rice
matches.snippet:

Ingredients:
o 1 cup rice
o 1 cup coconut milk
o 1 cup water
o 1/4 cup shredded coconut
o 1 teaspoon salt

Instructions:
o Sauté shredded coconut until lightly browned. o Add rice, coconut milk, water, and salt. o Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until rice is tender.
matches.section_content:

Ingredients:
o 1 cup rice
o 1 cup coconut milk
o 1 cup water
o 1/4 cup shredded coconut
o 1 teaspoon salt

Instructions:
o Sauté shredded coconut until lightly browned.
o Add rice, coconut milk, water, and salt.
o Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until rice is tender.
o Serve warm.
Coleslaw
